column4: hey guys i want to upgrade my laptop's hard drive, so i'm wondering if anybody knows any programs that can copy both my NTFS and EXT3 and SWAP partitions to the new HD? i don't feel like redoing all my settings ....
use dd for a byte-by-byte copy
i was looking at that but it seems quite extensive and i think i'd have to re-size these partitions, and it keeps the same UUID's so then i'd have to change those later on manually

When I copy from one drive to another, I boot the LiveCD and dd from source to destination, then extend/expand partitions on the destination, then remove the source drive, and boot from the new larger drive
